title: Hero MotoCorp announces price of Karizma as introductory offer gets over
description: Hero MotoCorp has announced the new price of the Karizma XMR motorcycle, keeping the per unit ex-showroom price at Rs 179,000. The current booking window for the motorcycle will close on September 30, and the date for the new booking window will be announced later with the revised price. The company has already started production and will soon commence deliveries.
